name: Pumpkin Night
description:
Please bear in mind that this was produced for a game jame (ECTOCOMP 2018) and therefore is not polished or playtested, and may have further updates in the future.

When a group of teenagers decide to have one last Hallowe'en party in the abandoned Black Lodge that overlooks their town, they have no idea what they're getting themselves into.

An interactive novel about the Hallowe'en mood.

Cover image by Taylor Rooney (https://unsplash.com/@rooney)
